snippet: Pinchas Zukerman led the Philharmonic in a program of Bach, Mozart and Stravinsky on Wednesday evening at Avery Fisher Hall.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by the New York Philharmonic, with violinist Pinchas Zukerman, at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: Pinchas Zukerman led the Philharmonic in a program of Bach, Mozart and Stravinsky on Wednesday evening at Avery Fisher Hall.

headline.seo: Pinchas Zukerman Leads Philharmonic in Bach and Mozart
headline.main: Guiding the Orchestra With His Violin and His Baton
headline.print_headline: Guiding the Orchestra With His Violin and His Baton
